content:
I'm puzzled that the IG Publisher doesn't expand this value set:
https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/ValueSet-IndividualSpecialtyAndDegreeLicenseCertificateVS.html

Is there something I can do to encourage its expansion?

Thx

I had a similar issue of "No Expansion for this valueset (not supported by Publication Tooling)" with a local ValueSet (A) that included codes from another local ValueSet (B). The expansion on ValueSet B did work properly though.

well, there's 2 problems. The first is that you are using http://www.nucc.org/provider-taxonomy not http://nucc.org/provider-taxonomy. The second is that you are using it in a value set that is nested 2 x deep, and so the underlying error message is obscured by other errors. I'll look into the second, but you can fix the first
also you have some invalid codes in the nucc enumeration
